name: Castle Of Fate (IronPowerTGA)
description:
A mysterious shadow appears from his grave ! 

 Walk through the desolate ruins of an ancient time and cross the castle. However, be careful, an evil entity inhabits it.

The game is inspired by Metroid and  castlevania type of games.  It is a 16 bits low resolution platformer game which contains challenging puzzle.

Control :

←→  or  left stick GamePad to move

↑  or  up stick GamePad to interact

X or A GamePad to Jump

C or X GamePad  to attack (when unlocked)

X + ↓ or  A GamePad + ↓ to Jump through plateforms

Game News : 

 https://twitter.com/IronPowerkh

Future plan : 

One zone, corresponding to the beginning zone and the first castle is achieved. Our goal is to make three more zones :

-- A forest and waterfall biome --

-- An underground and a sewer biome --

-- A final and big castle --

Credit : 

Developer, Game Designer, Level Design : Antoine Guilbaud (IronPowerTGA)

Level Design : Maxence Bazin (MightyCode)

Music and Sfx :  Ominous Pigeon Master
